talk.author: did:plc:akpoysvrgtmjpejlti5kvlpl
talk.utter: Just curious, you never saw her parents and didn't do any digging, what did you think she was?

talk.author: did:plc:adlvc74q64uixdbpzzh6di7c
talk.utter:
She just looked particularly tan to be honest. I didn’t care to investigate if that was because she’s middle-eastern, African-American, or whatever. 

I never really cared, because I don’t see race as a reason to vote or not vote for someone. I vote for people based on what they do and say.

talk.author: did:plc:akpoysvrgtmjpejlti5kvlpl
talk.utter: I don't even know how to respond to this...okay, have a nice day.
